content.description: Sun all day, Park in either the sylvan day use area or the Little Devils Tower Trailhead might be a little closer. If you park at Sylvan Lake Day use area Start at the #4 Trailhead and follow this for about 5-10 minutes you cannot miss this obvious spire with the crack running down it to your right. Very Obvious Spire next to trail. If you come in from Little Devils Tower Trailhead head towards Sylvan Lake (West) On Trail 4 for about 5-10 minutes and you can't miss this spire as you will approach it seeing the obvious crack. There is a new chain anchor on top as of 2017.
